Params: {3: 'The fight between Alpha and Rosetta leaves the already devastated port in further disarray.'}
{2: 'Sailor', 3: 'How dare they just stand there and run their mouths like nothing happened...', 4: '2'}
{2: 'Lucia', 3: 'I want to fight her one more time...', 4: '1'}
{1: '1', 2: 'α', 3: 'You must have a strong connection with the Narwhal, spanning such a long distance...', 4: '1'}
{2: 'α', 3: 'So you must have known all about the approaching waves of Corrupted.', 4: '1'}
{2: 'α', 3: 'Yet, there is no evacuation. None of your companions are here either. Which means—', 4: '1'}
{2: 'α', 3: 'Not only have you given up on humanity, but you choose to stand by and watch them get dragged into the abyss...', 4: '1'}
{2: 'α', 3: "Your only concern has always been the Narwhal... That's it.", 4: '1'}
{2: 'α', 3: "We're both eyeing the same thing... I imagine we must share similar pasts...", 4: '1'}
{2: 'α', 3: "We've both realized.. the folly of sacrificing ourselves for humanity.", 4: '1'}
{3: 'Alpha turns to look at the disgruntled crowd around them.', 4: '1'}
{2: 'α', 3: "You see, even now they don't want to fight for their own fate—", 4: '1'}
{3: 'A port citizen fires off a harpoon, only for her to catch it midair.'}
{3: 'Just as the citizen prepares to fire another harpoon, Alpha drops the one in her hand—'}
{3: 'A red current emits from her fingertips, and a sudden flash of light and thunderous boom sends him flying back a few meters.'}
{3: 'He immediately shows symptoms of corruption as the Punish Virus spreads throughout his body.'}
{2: 'Liv', 3: "You'll always find the wounded on the battlefield being aggressive. But their lives come first. Always.", 4: '1'}
{2: 'Liv', 3: 'We need to keep our emotions in check at a time like this...', 4: '1'}
{2: 'Liv', 3: 'We can neutralize the corruption if we inject you with the serum right away. Please.', 4: '1'}
{1: '1', 2: 'Liv', 3: "Our commandant also uses this. It's okay.", 4: '1'}
{3: 'As the serum enters his body, his agitation gradually subsides.'}
{3: 'In the blink of an eye, his symptoms begin to lessen.'}
{3: 'Seeing this, the crowd looks at Alpha and raises their harpoons.'}
{3: 'Rosetta looks on as the scene unfolds, gripping her lance tightly.'}
{2: 'Rosetta', 3: 'Unity, rules... Humans have survived here in the Arctic circle only thanks to being surrounded by the protection of a natural barrier.', 4: '1'}
{2: 'Rosetta', 3: 'Any outsider knows more about the reality of this cruel world than any of you...', 4: '1'}
{2: 'Rosetta', 3: 'You are utterly clueless about what you are up against...', 4: '1'}
{2: 'Rosetta', 3: 'New Murmansk is above to be flooded by a tidal wave of Corrupted.', 4: '1'}
{2: 'Rosetta', 3: 'Before it does... leave. Find a new home. This is the last bit of advice I have to offer.', 4: '1'}
{3: "Rosetta's petition, however, is met with the raging shots from the people..."}
